Reverse Expo

Client
Department of Computing Science, University of Alberta

Services
Branding, Print Design, Presentation Design

Tools
Adobe Illustrator, Adobe InDesign, Microsoft PowerPoint


Overview

Hosted by the Department of Computing Science at the University of Alberta, Reverse Expo brings academia and industry together to promote collaboration. Unlike typical recruitment events where companies give their pitch to students, Reverse Expo allows students to take the lead. In addition to showcasing their work, students are able to engage guests from industry and government to explore potential research partnerships as well as opportunities for internships or employment. In its inaugural year (2018), the event organizers knew that a clear visual identity for the Reverse Expo would help establish it as a staple in years to come.

Solution

The branding reflects the conference's role reversal, but also the interconnectedness between research and industry in the arrowed "x" of expo. Along with printed and digital signage, custom name badges and business cards were designed for the student researchers to enable and encourage networking, with flags indicating if they were looking for an internship or full-time employment. Happy to report that Reverse Expo was a success and continues to grow each year!
